DOC.brief_summary: The overall goal study develop evaluate brief , video-based , group-level intervention design reduce sexual risk take among culturally diverse English- Spanish-speaking Latino men sex men ( MSM ) .
DOC.brief_title: No Excuses/Sin Buscar Excusas Intervention Reduce Latino Men 's HIV Risks
DOC.criteria: Be age 18 49 Selfidentify Latino Hispanic Speak English and/or Spanish Reside NYC plan move next 3 month Have 2 sex partner last 3 month Have least 1 male sex partner last 3 month Have engage unprotected anal intercourse least one male partner last 3 month Be HIV negative know status Participated program ( research nonresearch ) past 6 month receive HIV prevention education ( e.g . inperson online group session , workshop , support group ) . Report HIVpositive
